response.overview: Is this the story of an Artificial Intelligence capable of writing a screenplay by itself? Is this the story of Esther, whose life seems centered on the pleasure of a sadistic rabbit? Or is it Corineâ€™s story, harassed by her lecherous boss? Or that of the young Lazaridis, who dreams every night of strangling a woman? And what if they were all consciously linked?
response.title: THE END (Artificial Fragments of Humankind)
